sentence.Network_en: Parliament may legislate on any matter of penal law.
sentence.Network_cn: 议会可以对刑事法律的任何事项立法.

sentence.Network_en: The punishments for robbery and murder are prescribed in the penal code.
sentence.Network_cn: 对抢劫和凶杀的惩罚在刑法中有明文规定.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French penal, from Latin poenalis, from poena 'pain, penalty'

entry.def: Penal means relating to the punishment of criminals.

example.ex: ...director-general of penal affairs at the justice ministry.

entry.tran: （机构或地区）关押服刑人员的
entry.def: A penal institution or colony is one where criminals are kept as punishment.

example.ex: ...imprisoned on an island that has served as a penal colony since Roman times.
example.tran: 被关押在自罗马时代以来就一直作为罪犯流放地的小岛上

means.word_mean: 2. serving as or designed to impose punishment;

stems_affixes.word_buile: peni=pen惩罚;痛苦+t+ent表形容词→受惩罚后而后悔→后悔的

pen惩罚;痛苦+ance表名词→n.自我惩罚

sentences.en: After his experience in jail, he has a pretty jaundiced view of the penal system.
